casebody.data:
Second Department,

June, 1984

(June 4, 1984) Anthony Aleci, Respondent, v Virgie E. Tinsley’s Enterprises, Inc., Appellant, et al., Defendants.

In an action to foreclose a mortgage, Virgie E. Tinsley’s Enterprises, Inc., appeals from an order of the Supreme Court, Suffolk County (Corso, J.), dated November 1, 1983, which, after a traverse hearing, denied its motion pursuant to CPLR 5015 (subd [a], par 4) to vacate a judgment entered on default. 11 Order affirmed, with costs (see Fashion Page v Zurich Ins. Co., 50 NY2d 265). Mangano, J. P., Thompson, O’Connor and Boyers, JJ., concur.
